Wisdom: أَضْيَقُ مَا يَكُونُ الْحَرَجُ أَقْرَبُ مَا يَكُونُ الْفَرَجُ
enWisdom: The more restricting [and difficult] the hardship, the closer the relief

Wisdom: أَقْرَبُ مَا يَكُونُ الْفَرَجُ عِنْدَ تَضَايُقِ الْأَمْرِ
enWisdom: The time when relief is closest is when the affair becomes unbearable

Wisdom: عِنْدَ انْسِدَادِ الْفَرَجِ تَبْدُو مَطَالِعُ الْفَرَجِ
enWisdom: When the openings [and ways] get blocked, the rays of relief begin to appear

Wisdom: عِنْدَ تَنَاهِي الشَّدَائِدِ يَكُونُ تَوَقُّعُ الْفَرَجِ
enWisdom: When the difficulties reach their peak, there is hope for relief

Wisdom: عِنْدَ تَضَايُقِ حِلَقِ الْبَلَاءِ يَكُونُ الرَّخَاءُ
enWisdom: When the circle of affliction tightens, ease follows

Wisdom: مَا اشْتَدَّ ضِيقٌ إِلَّا قَرَّبَ اللَّهُ فَرَجَهُ
enWisdom: No agony intensifies but that Allah brings its relief closer

Wisdom: الْمَصَائِبُ بِالسَّوِيَّةِ مَقْسُومَةٌ بَيْنَ الْبَرِيَّةِ
enWisdom: Hardships are divided equally among the creatures

Wisdom: الْمُصِيبَةُ بِالصَّبْرِ أَعْظَمُ الْمُصِيبَتَيْنِ
enWisdom: Adversity [endured] with patience is the better of the two adversities

Wisdom: أَكْرَهُ الْمَكَارِهِ فِيمَا لَا يُحْتَسَبُ
enWisdom: Noble traits are [acquired] through difficulties

Wisdom: أَوْلَى النَّاسِ بِالْحَذَرِ أَسْلَمُهُمْ عَنِ [مِنَ‏] الْغِيَرِ
enWisdom: The most worthy of giving [to] is the one who feels the least in need of asking [from others]

Wisdom: إِنَّ لِلْمِحَنِ غَايَاتٍ لَا بُدَّ مِنِ انْقِضَائِهَا فَنَامُوا لَهَا إِلَى حِينِ انْقِضَائِهَا فَإِنَّ إِعْمَالَ الْحِيلَةِ فِيهَا قَبْلَ ذَلِكَ زِيَادَةٌ لَهَا
enWisdom: Verily tribulations have certain extents that have to be passed so remain in slumber until they pass, for indeed trying to find a solution before this only increases [and prolongs] it

Wisdom: إِنَّ لِلْمِحَنِ غَايَاتٍ وَلِلْغَايَاتِ نِهَايَاتٍ فَاصْبِرُوا لَهَا حَتَّى تَبْلُغَ نِهَايَاتُهَا فَالتَّحَرُّكُ لَهَا قَبْلَ انْقِضَائِهَا زِيَادَةٌ لَهَا
enWisdom: Verily tribulations have certain extents, and the extents have limits, so remain patient until you reach their limits, for trying to find a solution for them before they have passed only increases [and prolongs] them

Wisdom: إِذَا خِفْتَ صُعُوبَةَ أَمْرٍ فَاصْعُبْ لَهُ يَذُلَّ لَكَ وَخَادِعِ الزَّمَانَ عَنْ أَحْدَاثِهِ تَهُنْ عَلَيْكَ
enWisdom: When you fear the difficulty of an affair then be firm against it, it will yield to you; and deceive time about its calamities, it will become easy for you

Wisdom: إِذَا أَتَتْكَ الْمِحَنُ فَاقْعُدْ لَهَا فَإِنَّ قِيَامَكَ فِيهَا زِيَادَةٌ لَهَا
enWisdom: When tribulations come to you then sit and accept them, for indeed your standing up and confronting them will only aggravate them

Wisdom: بِالْفَجَائِعِ يَتَنَغَّصُ السُّرُورُ
enWisdom: Through calamities, happiness is spoiled

Wisdom: خُضِ الْغَمَرَاتِ إِلَى الْحَقِّ حَيْثُ كَانَ
enWisdom: Plunge into hardships to [arrive at] the truth wherever it may be

Wisdom: رُبَّ طَرَبٍ يَعُودُ بِالْحَرْبِ [كَالْحَرْبِ‏]
enWisdom: Many a time jubilation turns into rage

Wisdom: رُبَّ مَرْحُومٍ مِنْ بَلَاءٍ هُوَ دَوَاؤُهُ
enWisdom: Many a person is shown sympathy for an affliction that is [actually] his cure

Wisdom: رُبَّمَا تَجَهَّمَتِ الْأُمُورُ
enWisdom: Sometimes matters look grim (or inescapable)

Wisdom: عِنْدَ الشَّدَائِدِ تَذْهَبُ الْأَحْقَادُ
enWisdom: In times of difficulty, feelings of malice disappear

Wisdom: مَنْ رَكِبَ الْأَهْوَالَ اكْتَسَبَ الْمَالَ
enWisdom: Whoever embarks on the frightful [and risky] earns wealth
